website_summaries.verdict: Nike adds a standout model to its Air Max collection. Made for women, by women, the Air Max Dia SE’s most salient feature is its ultra-modern feminine look. Not without subtlety, its transparent upper serves as a vessel to show female character through sock choices.Moreover, the sneaker is fashionable as it is functional. With Air cushioning boosting its midsole, the sneaker offers superb comfort for daily use.
pros: The Nike Air Max Dia SE has an eye-catching, futuristic silhouette, according to most buyers
Many testers have reported that the sneaker is absolutely comfy and great for all-day use
A couple of users like that their sock prints showed through the transparent upper
Plenty of women rave about getting compliments on the first day of wearing them
The platform-like midsole has delighted some wearers, who said that the extra inches made them look taller
It is among the Nike sneakers that are sleek and lightweight, a small group of reviewers have noted
At least one customer calls the Nike Air Max Dia SE a show-stopper
cons: Few users have complained that the low-top sneaker lacked ankle support
Some users dislike that the laces aren’t reinforced

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes the fit is so comfortable and I haven't seen anyone with them so that's a good thing cuz I like to be different
customer_reviews.author: Meshea L. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, great service/seller...A++
customer_reviews.text: Cute as a button, and fits like a soft, supportive sock. Shipping was fast with no problems! Great product and seller!A++
customer_reviews.author: AAcevedoRN

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: You pay for the cushion with Nike and these thicker sole prvent my feet from hurting after walking or workout.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Allinson

customer_reviews.title: Right fits perfectly, left too small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really nice looking. But while the right shoe fits perfectly the left one is felling really small and tight (while the right leg is usually the problematicone for me). Feels like these are not the same pair. I wore them so I cant return.
customer_reviews.author: irena

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes until right after the return date was expired. These shoes started making a popping noise about 4 weeks after my husband purchased them for me. I had only worn them a few times. It was a loud obnoxious popping sound. I decided to wear them to walk in because I would not hear the sound with my headphones on. Well after I finish walking, I look down to find the pink band was falling off. They are pretty and comfortable for about 4 wks then they are ready for the trash. I am really irritated that I wasted our money .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great but inside is a little hard
customer_reviews.text: It looks just it does in the picture and I received alot of complements. The fit was also great with enoufh room space for a thick pair of socks. The inside of the shoe was a bit hard and the weight of thr shoe was heavy so after a few hours i got uncomfortable. Overall i like it
customer_reviews.author: Kemoy

customer_reviews.title: It runs a little wide but it is okay
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best and comfortable sneakers I own. I work long hours shift in the hospital needed new shoes, I am so glad I got those. look nice goes with my uniform no pain comfy and light nothing not to like about these sneakers, I will definitely get another pair in different color.
customer_reviews.author: Gemayrole Antoine

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Walking Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lightweight walking shoe. These are perfect. They are comfortable and well-cushioned. These shoes, even though synthetic, are so attractive. The subtle colors match everything: blue, grey, black, fushia. I would definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I think I was expecting more of a coral color but nevertheless I like them. True to size. Fits perfectly, feel comfortable, Casual but very sharp looking. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: San Mac Lover

customer_reviews.title: badly designed shoes
customer_reviews.text: If you have an issues with Overpronation these shoes are not be you.. I went for a walk and 6 blocks into it was limping home. The shoes has NO stability, I have not had an issue like this with other Nike shoes, so maybe this style is just bad but for $100 they should not be.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Den Boer

customer_reviews.title: I am always in style with NIKE.
customer_reviews.text: I was so amazed to find these in this color. I received so many compliments from friends and coworkers for the look and style of these Air Max.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmiechelle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME walking shoe! I am buying a second pair for fashion purposes lol...lol... Although I washed my play pair and they came out like new.... I just LOVE 💘💘💘 the LOOK of a crisp pair when wearing cute outfits!! I hike...ride bike...run..work... GREAT SHOE!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Rich

customer_reviews.title: BEST sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: BEST sneakers I have ever owned. They are comfortable and the colors make me smile.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Ebarb

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving these shoes!! They look exactly like the picture!! The fit is perfect. True to size!! I'll definitely buy another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Reasha

customer_reviews.title: Dope kicks!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great! Gift for my wife and she loved them. The Nike came a little beat up but that’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foster

customer_reviews.title: good lookin' and good feelin'
customer_reviews.text: great sneaker/shoe all around. looks sharp and is very comfy. not a workout shoe, mind you; but awesome and stylish for walking and standing in for hours at a time!! also got the shoe in other color combos :)
customer_reviews.author: raynee l.

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These kicks are off the chain!!! Exactly what I wanted. Sporty, sleek, feminine and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sause

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo cute and I get tons of compliments! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This item fits great, I really like these sneakers. Thank you so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Nike Women’s Air Max
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look the same in person as they did online and fit well. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Look amazing, very comfortable, the colors are beautiful, very happy with the purchase, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Klepacki

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are not comfortable. I wore them all day long. My back and legs were killing me by the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit the comfort and the style..I would recommend this to anyone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ronta carter

customer_reviews.title: SIZING IS WAY WAY OFF
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is so far off and they wont send you a return slip. You have to pay to return them yourself
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

product_meta.title: Nike Air Max Dia SE Shoes for Women
product_meta.description: The valued look of AIR. The Nike Air Max Dia SE has been specially developed for women's feet and impresses with its raised, airy aesthetics and elegant shape. The minimal outer material modernizes the look, while the Max Air element, surrounded by clear TPU, is now even bigger and shows an extended midsole for even more style. The outer material made of textile and synthetic complements the light aesthetics. Max Air element provides cushioning under the foot. Shape and profile are specially designed for women's foot. The pronounced foam midsole ensures light wearing comfort with a refined look. The rubber around the outsole guarantees traction and stability.
